tag_list: movies, films, action, adventure, horror, thriller, love, romance
overview: Julian Cheah is a motion picture and television actor-producer-director of Malaysia. He obtained a B.F.A. Bachelor of Fine Arts degree on Film/TV from New York University, and since 1988 until today, manages his own film production company.

milestones.description: Trailer of the Julian Cheah movie, "The Hired Killer".
